transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hello. Sir a very good morning. Kaise ho?
Customer: Badhiya mam.
Executive: Main Pragati baat kar rahi hu sir account manager IndiaMART se.
Customer: Bataye mam.
Executive: Sir kal to Sunday tha to hamari baat nahi ho pai video meet karne ke liye aapne request dali thi na yahan par.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To aap kab tak free ho rahe hain sir please bata de main wo time schedule kar leti hu aapke sath. Main sir main 2 baje ke aas pass me free ho jaunga.
Executive: 2 baje ke baad?
Customer: 2 baje ji ji.
Executive: Sir hum 3 baje tak schedule kar sakte hain 3 baje tak sir. Ji ji ji ji. Ya fir uske pehle hi aap bata de sir aapko koi suitable time ho to aapke according.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi main 2 baje ke aas pass hi aapko call kar. Hai na 2 baje tak hi aap free ho pa rahe hain na?
Executive: Ji ji.
Executive: Thik hai sir chaliye tab utne baje tak connect karte hain but please sir free ho jayega okay?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir okay thank you.
Customer: Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requested a video meet.

- Wants to schedule the video meet.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for a suitable time.

- Agreed to connect around 2:00 PM or 3:00 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect around 2:00 PM or 3:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, schedule, time
